mapper.select: SELECT c.member_email, c.no, SUM(c.qty) AS qty, i.name, i.content, i.price, i.qty AS tq FROM p1_cart c INNER JOIN p1_market i ON c.item_no = i.no WHERE c.member_email=#{email} GROUP BY item_no ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM p1_cart WHERE no In ( #{vo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p1_cart SET qty=#{qty} WHERE no=#{no}
